Row.Text: The temple bell rings out across Korea, and Silla responds. In their palaces, the seonggol pursue a life of luxury, lending inspiration to the craftsman’s hands, the poet’s brush, and the soldier’s step. Guide Silla now, and bring an enlightened hand to a darkened world.
Rising above disorder, Silla emerges the first of the three kingdoms. With guile and grace, may it become the greatest.
Alliances are key to Silla's strategy, so keep those relationships friendly and manage your Influence wisely on Endeavors.
